ygData.subject: Knight
ygData.msgSnippet: The other day I was looking through my inventory when I came across something that baffles me. It is an icon with a picture of a knight on it. When I inspect
ygData.messageBody:
The other day I was looking through my inventory when I came across something that baffles me. It is an icon with a picture of a knight on it. When I inspect it it says KNIGHT and that all classes can have it and it weights 2.0. It doesn't say that it is a lore item and it doesn't fit in any of my body inventory slots. Anyone have any idea as to what it is? I do not remember anyone giving it to me. I have just finished taking out Byle Bundin but I don't remember having received the knight when I completed this quest. I got a whole 8 silvers, oh boy. Thanks for any help.

--Bruceson, 12 lvl Dwarven Paladin, Tunare server
